title: Who Will Be The Top Seed In The East?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk how the Heat can be the top seed in the East, if the Bulls can avoid slipping in the standings considering their injuries, what the ceiling is for the Cavs and what is next for the Nets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: How Will The Rankings Sort Out This Season In The East?
